values:
School.

Beach with Bern and Andrew....
It was great- There were some real movie scenes going on in the sand, ;)

Came home, showered, chores, t.v.

Went to Perkins to see if I had a job- they're calling me Friday.

Went to Win-Dixie for a "just-in-case" application.

Home

Chores

Food

Tv

And here I am. What a busy day, huh? Hahah-not.

xoxo

Came back from Cheltsy's at like, 5:30, we baked a cake...mmm mm good! haha...
So tomorrow, the plan is: go to 1st and 2nd period, 3rd period my sister is picking me up and we're either going to the beach or to a movie. My mom is writing a note for me and all that good stuff so it's excused. heh.
I'm about to go clean my room so I can't blabber on for too long.

Monee...that note was funny. I humor that chik.

mwah
xoxo

-Woke up at 6 am because I had a scary as hell dream.
-Called Andrew and woke him up to tell him about it.
-Talked to him 'till 8:30 and then went back to sleep.
-Woke up at 12:30
-Mowed lawn
-Went to Andrew's around 4:30
-Him, (this other dude who's name I forgot), Alicia and I sat by the pool, Alicia and I talked Andrew into putting his feet in.
-Started splashing andrew and we both ended up soaking wet. So then, I changed into a pair of his b-ball shorts and shirt while my clothes were in the dryer.
-Played basketball! I Actually made a few good baskets! WOOP WOOP!
-Ate some meatballs...damn they were better than my mom's, and she's Italian.
-Mom picked me up at 7:45.
-Going to Cheltsy's to spend the night soon.

Today was actually really nice...

I love you moe moe!!!!!!

Band concert yesterday... FPC was tight. Man, Andrew was so sexy in that uniform...yummy...haha. The drumline was a.m.a.z.i.n.g --nice moves too ;)

I'm joining the chorus. YEY go me- the chorus geek to be!! haha nah- I can't wait, singing is my passion, I just need to learn how to control my voice.

...moving on...

I applied for a position at Perkins today, if this doesn't work out, then Winn Dixie or Publix are my next victims...mwahahaaha. Ok evil moment over.

Nice hair Erik...it's so....you? Sure why not, that works.

Dead body found in Wally World. But everyone knows about that already. If you don't know about it, I suggest you get out more. heh.

Good lunch food with Salina ;) yeah babah.

v.e.r.y good hugs and makeout sessions with Andrew. As always ;)

Oh! I almost forgot. I was talking to this kid today in first period. I won't use names on the risk of getting him jumped. (although that might not be too bad of a thing).

Me: Did anyone go to the concert last night?

Him and like, 3 other people: Nope.

Me: It was awsome, my boyfriend was in the drumline. They were great.

Him: Your boyfriend is black, isn't he?

Me: Yeah.

Him: Well, i'm racist and I don't believe in that mixing crap.

Me: Well then, it's a good thing you're not dating a black girl.

Him: Hell yeah that would be nasty, they have all that nappy hair.

Me: So, you don't find Beyonce Knowles attractive?

Him: Who's that?

::laughter heard from across the room @ such ignorance::

Random person: She was that girl in Gold member.

Him:Oh, her? She's ugly.

Me: Haha no way. So I suppose you don't like big butts too?

Him: No-

Me: Yeah, you like little skinny butts? Or maybe just a straight down back?

Him: No, just little. Plus, black people are loud. They're always in the hallways yelling to eachother, like they can't go up to eachother and talk.

Me: Not all black people are like that, and I can name many white people who are loud too. What do you think of Hitler?

Him: Hitler's awsome.

Me: You're going to Hell.

Then Danielle and I moved across the room. I can't stand ignorant people, it's sad, really.

 

leave some love;

mwah

Movies w/ Cheltsy, Roy, and Andrew.

Ice cream after movies.

Good times.

Came home, found a turtle.

Contemplating a name....any ideas? haha...

<3

I don't know what the right thing to do is...

I guess...I'll just do what feels right in my heart. One thing i've learned though, is some people really wont take your words seriously until you take serious actions. 

Time for serious actions.

I cried today, I didn't expect it. Normally I know when the tears are coming, but they surprised me today.

hugs rock...haha Annamaria.

On a lighter note....

MY SEXY MAMI SALINA IS BACK!! I LOVE U LINA!! WHOOP WHOOP!!!

I think I need a break. Like seriously- i think i'm ready for summer but then again- no.

I can't possibly begin to describe the incredible anger i'm feeling right now. I don't even know where to begin-

Have you ever been so angry that you've cried? Not crying out of sadness, but you're so angry you can't help it. Then, afterwards you have this headache, and you can feel the tears in the back of your eyes-just waiting to be released. Well, that doesn't even begin to describe what i'm feeling.

My family is so broken. I don't feel guilty in the least by saying that my mother is the cause of our detachment. My brother is failing math, and there is a very great chance that he will get held back. Well, my mom and dad decided that he wouldn't be allowed to use the computer for his whole spring break. (He lives on the computer, playing runescape. It's all he talks about, ever- and i'm not overexaggerating.) It's sick, i've never seen anyone so obsessed with a game. This week, his spring break started. He has been on the computer every day since then. I tell my parents, and they care for the first day- they have a little meeting to talk about what they should do about him-the whole thing was BULLSHIT because he recieved NO PUNISHMENT. They just don't care that he doesn't respect what they say. He does nothing around the house, and complains when asked to do something. He is so disrespectful, he talks back to my mom, calling her "female" and condescending shit like that. I honestly hate the person he has become. I feel like I need to straighten him out by making him do the things my parents ask him to do, and be on his back until he does it. But the sad thing is, that is what I have to do in order for him to actually get off his ass and do something asked of him. I can't take it anymore....I can't. I feel like there is nothing I can do, but there is so much I want to do.

My mom grounded me from the phone today because I was doing something and couldn't whipe my nepphew's ass right away. I told her I couldn't believe that I got punished for not whiping my nepphews butt when my brother didn't even get a minor punishment for disrespecting their wishes. I told her that the child she should be focusing on was Richard. He's only 12 and he has no respect. So what's gonna happen when he gets into highschool? He's only going to get worse. Then I told her that he's gonna be a drug addict with the direction he's going and she screamed to me at the top of her lungs "shut the fuck up"

and I know why that made her anger boil over, because she knows it's true. Every ounce of what I said to her was the absolute truth. And that scares her to death because she doesn't know what to do, and she feels powerless. That's why she's always so angry...she's angry at herself.

 

love

Andrew came over today...good times...
We watched "Anger Management" and went in the pool...it look like, a half hour to convince him to get in the pool.
He went home at like, 6...and now, here I am!

I have to make my own easter basket....
Hell as long as I get candy, it is ALL dandy :)

I'll update more later, too lazy right now...haha

love

Interesting. I left Thursday during school to go to New York. My cousin was getting married...It was a beautiful wedding. I've decided that I really don't want to get married the way she did, in a church, because it all seemed so...I don't know, what's the word...informal.
Not the outfits, or the surroundings, but the actual event of their marriage. My cousin and the groom (Anthony) actually sat down while the priest spoke. I don't want my wedding to be like that, I want it old-fashioned. It wasn't even announced "I now pronounce you husband and wife, you may kiss the bride." I couldn't tell at what point during the ceremony they were really made husband and wife...oh well...

The remainder of my Spring break was spent hanging out with my family in New York, and we came back last Thursday.

Speeding up to Saturday. Andrew was going to come over since it was a special occasion...


HAPPY ONE YEAR BABY!!!!!!!!!

...but his mom wanted him to go to this picnick his church was having by the water. It was actually alot of fun. Good food...nice scenery...good food....haha. I liked the food. Danielle was there and so was this girl Sabrina, she was really friendly. I like her :)

Nature walks are great.

There was one event that kind of put a damper on the whole evening, but i'm not going to get into details right now. Anywho, I think i'm going to go lay out. Wish me luck.

Love....

Thanks for the lil gifts guys!!!

-Andrew- that ring is so beautiful, i love it almost as much as I love you (that is a-LOT!!!)
-Afsha- aww girl those muffins and cake were mmm-mmm good, thanks afshizzle! 
-Cheltsy- girl, you are waaay to generous haha thanks for awsome card and MOCHILA!
-Sam- I finally got a baloon!! haha thanks sooo much girly that was so sweet of you to think of me!


MWAH!

"It is better to be pissed off, than pissed on."

-My Daddy

::::::::::::::::happy sigh::::::::::::::::

Universal was so great. When we got there, we all ate a sub in the van. It was yummyful. Anyways, after stuffing our faces, we proceeded to the park. The first ride we went on was "Jurassic Park" haha Andrew got so soaked. I had a water bottle and I dumped it on my dad and brother right before the big drop. Well we went on that twice, and then we went on popeye. Man o man we all got so wet, all of our clothes were soaked.  Okay, so after popeye, they were begging me to go on "Dr. Doom" and I knew that I would get sick because that thing just shakes, and rides like that don't mix well with me. I gave in after about 15 minutes of pleading and decided to ride it. Just to be nice ;) haha. I didn't feel really sick afterwards, so I thought it would be okay for us to go on the hulk. Well, I screamed the first minute, and then I felt it comming. I was gonna puke. Thankfully, the ride ended before I blew. Andrew could tell, too...and he held me the whole way to the bathroom- God I really felt like I was gonna puke right then and there. I spent the next half hour in the bathroom, staring at the toilet...-it was no go. I wasn't gonna puke but I still felt sick. It even hurt to move my eyes and speak. So, to help me recouperate, we went back into our *new* van and put down the back seat so I could lay down. We stayed in the van for about an hour and watched The Matrix Reloaded, by then I could walk by myself. We went back into the park and went on Spiderman, I closed my eyes the whole time, because the screen was making me feel sicker. After that, my brothers went on Dueling Dragons- Andrew wanted to go on it, and I told him to go- but he wanted more to stay with me (which was really, really sweet of him)- So we walked around and looked at the shops, tried on sunglasses and watched these weird people make coins. It was really fun. So by then it was about 6:40, and the park closes at 7:00 so we left to go out to eat. I was really set on eating at Outback-dang they've got some good food. Me and Andrew got the same thing- my brothers, my brother's friend, and my dad were acting soo crazy, it was great haha. Andrew and Dan, my brother's friend, really hit it off. It was so cute watching him mess w/ Dan. Good times, good times. The ride home was perfect. Andrew and I in the backseat, he held me the whole time. Even kissed me once when I wasnt expecting it. It was so sweet, I love him so much....

well, that ends it- that was a great time- i'm just sad its over :(

ps- dont forget my birthday on the 18th!!!!!!

love
THIS THURSDAY (18TH) IS MY BIRTHDAY!!!

Beach today w/ Cheltsy. Fun times! 
Moving on...
Danielle, I don't see why you're mad at me, You were sapposed to call ME back and that never happened. Plus, you know my number is blocked and that I can't get through to your house. And I didn't get pissed at you once when you stood me up three weeks in a row when I was sapposed to go to church with you. Another thing- you said I was just using going to church with you as a way to see Andrew- yeah that played a big part in me wanting to go- but you're being hypocritical in saying that because you have came over my house and then spent the whole time with Ruslan- I didn't get pissy at you for THAT either. I told you my plans with Cheltsy weren't for sure, and that if you called me back telling me if I could hang w/ you that I would, but you didn't- so what did you expect?

love

Why do I feel so strange lately...?
It's scaring me...
Only 2 people know what i'm talking about.

Universal Studios Friday!!!!!!!.....
Bored...
I have all of my mid-terms finished...thank God. I'm sure I did good on all of them.....and I didn't even have to cheat!...mwahahahahahaha.

People annoy me...

Persons make me smile.

I'm aggrivated right now. 

Salina's comming back in 2 weeks!! YES!
And Danielle, i'm comming to church w/ you this Sunday...cause, umm..I want to. ;)
I can't wait for FRIDAY~! I'm so excited, it's like when I was little, how excited I would get when Christmas was right around the corner...only this is better! haha....

love

There are times, when my soul is dampened by magazine images and "society's physical standards" -and I feel so ugly.

But you always manage to raise my spirits, and to make me feel like I am the most radiant, beautiful, and glorious creature God created on our wonderfully diverse planet...
he loves my curves...
And I love his love; the way he loves me with such an undying passion that will forever burn strong....

For that...I thank you...

And I love you for that...


MWAHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Oh God, Andrew....we're getting REALLY bad.

No, not like that.

Today, Andrew and I were talking on the phone...

Me: Baby.... Our 11-month Anniversary is in two days! (Thinking it was March 1st)
Andrew: I know...wait! No it's not, it's tomorrow...
(thinking it was March 2nd)
Me: Oh yeah....whoops....

So we hang up a little after that, and I call him back in 10 mins....

Me: Hey honey
Andrew: Happy Anniversary babe!
Me: Uh...are you tryin to mess with me?
Andrew: No, TODAY is March 3rd, Zavier told me.
Me: Na-uh....no way...nice try, babes.
Andrew: No, it is, cause I have it on my phone. And it's Wednesday.
Martine: No, it's Tuesday, we've been doing FCAT yesterday and today. Oh wait...Monday was that calculator thing....oOoOohhhhhhh!!! Happy Anniversary baby!!!

....haha, oh goodness. that was sad, yet funny. My mom is taking Andrew and I to Universal, and one of the days my mom is thinking of going is April 3rd.....OUR 1-YEAR-ANNIVERSARY!
-only SHE doesn't know that. Wow...that would be so completely perfect. Thats gonna be some fun shit. Heck yeah!

I'm gonna kill you, Michael.

Anyways, I must be off...ciao

love

My head is POUNDING.
Update later.


love
Monee, I need to talk to you....PRONTO.

....thank GOD!

Anywho- I'm bored. Afsha gave me a really sweet note today (i'm writing you back this weekend).

Man, I swear, I almost DIED in Mr. Eddy's class today. I have the highest grade in the class (of 8 people -hahahaha- great accomplishment, right?). Well my average is at LEAST a high B per test, and today, my brain just shut down. It sucked. So right..are you following me still?....good...Well I was turning in my test, (Mr. Eddy was in his office) and Tony says to me "Dang, Mr. Eddy is so stupid, he left the answers on his desk." Sure enough, I looked over and there they were...calling for me to look at them. I didn't want it to be obvious, so Tony read the answers to me...I got alot of them right anyway. But I made a "B" (80%) on it. An ok grade. N-E-wayz. Moving on.

My biology mid-term is on Thursday. Here's the deal, i'm bringing in my dog, and a video for shiggles and gits. The video blows ass, but it has that stupid kinda humor in it that you would see in "All That." It's better than talking for 6+ minutes.

I bet you're wondering if I have anything to talk about of even the slightest of significance. Well, the truth is, no.

My brothers are kicking  eachother's butts. Should I interfer?.......Nah.

I'll update later. You know you can't wait...

love

WELCOME BACK *AFSHIZZLETTE*

EYE LUB YOU!!

Does anyone know what's wrong with Erik?
He admitted something was wrong, but couldn't tell me because the bell was about to ring.
That sucks.
Right now i'm using the excuse of sitting on my ass to type this "extremely important" journal entry instead of going to do my aerobics. I must do them. I must. Must....get....off....ass.....
Ok i'm going. I swear. I promise. Really....

Ok i'm gone.

love

Aggrivate me. Tell me, how are you going to completely loathe a person who has done you wrong one day, then its all completely *LiKe-ToTaLlY-fAb!!!!!!* the damned next? Fuck that. I don't understand you...everyone who has treated you like shit, you "hate them" for about a week or so, and then it's back to "hey buddies!! lets all shit on meeee!!!!!!"

Moving on....

I'm bored. Very bored. I want to work this weekend.....(yeah. I know what you're thinking.)

I'm going to go preform my daily ritual of stuffing my face now, adios.

love

Yesterday was great! I worked nine hours, and it went by so fast. Best part is, I don't have to be a busser anymore. I'm going to be washing dishes, preparing food, and all that good stuff.
There was this short black dude at VFW, and he had on these black pants, red shirt, and then one of those red pimp-looking hats (that you always see on movies). He LOOKED like an actual pimp. So anyways, here's what happened..
Me: may I take your plate?
Him: sure, go right ahead.
(I noticed he had two chocolate hearts on his plate)
Me: Do you want to take the hearts off?
Him: No thanks, I don't want them.
Me: Well can I have 'em then?
Him: Yeah, but only if you think about me when you're eating them....

HAHAHA oh God, that was funny. I didn't know what to say so I just took them and walked off.

I have to dedicate today to finishing my Algebra project on John Nash. That should be TONS of fun. Yeah. Just...tons.

This is what i'm considering for my Sweet 16...

I forgot to tell you about my dream......

At first, I was having a normal dream (I don't remember what that one was about). But suddenly it switched and I was lying in my bed (I could see myself only from the chest up). I was lying on my side, so I turned on my back and looked up. Suddenly this dark figure appeared to be standing over me, like he was standing right behind my bed, looking over at me with this evil grin....I couldnt see his face, just his menacing smile. I screamed in my dream, and I think I screamed as I woke up from it. I was on my back when I woke up......It seems somewhat long, but it really lasted only a second or two, literally.

I was so afraid to shut my eyes...I called up Andrew at 3am to tell him. Then I talked to Cheltsy for about a half hour and called Andrew back up. I was finally able to go to sleep at 4....

The weird thing is, in my dream it felt like I knew what I was doing as I was sleeping- Like as I was turning over in my dream, I was turning over in reality....

very strange...what's your take on it?

Well, yesterday I talked to Andrew about what had been on my mind, and I feel better now. He always knows how to make me smile. (Ps- If you are one of those people who for some odd reason "dislike" entries about significant others, leave now.) I know that he loves me and only me- I trust him when he says that. The way he looks at me-amazes me...I've never seen it from anyone before. And the other day, I was looking at him, and he was just staring into my eyes. I was like- what?? I mean yeah- we have had some rocky times, but they just seem to bring us closer together
